mapper.select: select a.id, a.managecom, (select shortname from ldcom com where com.comcode = a.managecom) as managecomname, c.branchattr, b.name as branchname, a.wageno, b.agentcode, b.name, oldinsuranceper, doctorinsuranceper, workinsuranceper, hurtinsuranceper, birthinsuranceper, houseinsuranceper, sumwelfareper, oldinsurancecom, doctorinsurancecom, workinsurancecom, hurtinsurancecom, birthinsurancecom, houseinsurancecom, sumwelfarecom, accchildrenedu, acccontinueedu, acchousingloaninterest, acchousingrent, accsupportold, sumaccspecialdeduction from lawelfaretax a left join laagent b on a.agentcode = b.agentcode left join labranchgroup c on c.agentgroup = b.agentgroup ${ew.getCustomSqlSegment}
